# Coder VSCode Cloud Unraid Application

## Project Overview
Building a Unraid Application template for deploying Coder v2.27.9-amd64 (cloud-based development environment) as a Docker container on Unraid servers.

## Configuration Choices
- Database: SQLite (default)
- TLS: HTTPS with reverse proxy support
- IDE: VSCode (primary)

## Implementation Checklist
- [x] Create project structure
- [x] Create XML template file (coder.xml)
- [x] Create Docker Compose configuration
- [x] Create environment variables documentation (ENV.md)
- [x] Create setup guide (SETUP.md)
- [x] Create README for publication
- [x] Create testing guide (TESTING.md)
- [x] Create contribution guide (CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [x] Create project roadmap (ROADMAP.md)
- [x] Create .gitignore
- [x] Final project structure validation

## Completed Files
1. `coder.xml` - Unraid Docker template with full configuration
2. `docker-compose.yml` - Docker Compose for testing/standalone deployment
3. `ENV.md` - Complete environment variables documentation
4. `SETUP.md` - Step-by-step setup and troubleshooting guide
5. `README.md` - Project overview and quick start guide
6. `TESTING.md` - Comprehensive testing procedures
7. `CONTRIBUTING.md` - Contribution guidelines
8. `ROADMAP.md` - Future development roadmap
9. `.gitignore` - Version control exclusions
10. `.github/copilot-instructions.md` - This file
